events.name: The StoneHack Challenge
events.about:
Three one day hackathons where devs are challenged to build prototypes from teachers suggestions. At BETT 2013 - Stone Group stand (C70).

Dates of the hackathon are:

  • Wednesday 30th January 
  • Thursday 31st January
  • Friday 1st February

From 10am to 5pm each day.

Pls note: Participants must sign up for free tickets to the exhibition hall here: http://www.bettshow.com/Visiting
events.address: One Western Gateway Royal Victoria Dock
